sys_ux_macroponent.description: Provides an exploratory view of indicators for detailed analysis. It lets users see trends, predictions, breakdowns, and associated records for a specific indicator. The KPI Details page also enables users to aggregate changes in indicators into discrete time intervals by selecting a time aggregation.
sys_ux_macroponent.name: Default
